publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1274 Donald Gorrie: Big in Falkirk Arts Event-That the Parliament congratulates the town of Falkirk on the recent success of its Big in Falkirk street and community arts festival; acknowledges the hard work of all those people who contributed to the event, and thanks the various sponsors and artists who contributed to its success.

S2M-1274 Donald Gorrie: Big in Falkirk Arts Event-That the Parliament congratulates the town of Falkirk on the recent success of its Big in Falkirk street and community arts festival; acknowledges the hard work of all those people who contributed to the event, and thanks the various sponsors and artists who contributed to its success.
S2M-1274 Big in Falkirk Arts Event (lodged on 5 May 2004) Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*
